original_text: Ye shall not round the corners of your heads, neither shalt thou mar the corners of thy beard.
korean_text: 머리 가를 둥글게 깎지 말며 수염 끝을 손상하지 말며

sentences.original_text: Ye shall not round the corners of your heads
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 머리의 모서리를 동그랗게 자르지 말라

sentences.original_text: neither shalt thou mar the corners of thy beard
